mapper.select: select c.cate_id,c.cate_name, p.proid,p.pro_name,p.create_time,p.pro_com,p.tel,p.menu2_id,p.menu3_id from category c right join project p on c.cate_id = p.cate_id

select c.cate_id,c.cate_name, p.proid,p.pro_name,p.create_time,p.pro_com,p.tel,p.menu2_id,p.menu3_id, c2.cid,c2.proid,c2.uid,c2.create_time,c2.is_delete from category c right join project p on c.cate_id = p.cate_id left join collection1 c2 on p.proid = c2.proid where c.cate_id=#{cateId} and p.menu2_id=#{menu2Id} and p.menu3_id=#{menu3Id}
